attributes.action: Allow fully vaccinated visitors from red list countries
attributes.additional_details: A majority of visitors to the UK visit during the spring and summer months.  International travel restrictions last year and continued ban on visitors from red list countries this year means many will be deprived from visiting family and friends till next summer i.e. for three years.
attributes.background: Fully vaccinated visitors from red list countries with negative RT-PCR should be allowed to visit and home quarantine as an additional precautionary measure to protect public health.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Allow non-UK nationals and residents to travel to the UK from red list countries
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/583720

Allow fully vaccinated people coming from red list countries to isolate at home
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/588072
